Adaptive Multi-Fidelity Aerospace Optimization

Advanced Simulation-Based Optimization for Aerospace Systems

Combining low- and high-fidelity models with adaptive switching to optimize aircraft and spacecraft performance under uncertainty while reducing computational cost and ensuring robust, reliable design outcomes.

System Overview

Our adaptive multi-fidelity optimization system represents a breakthrough in aerospace design methodology. By intelligently combining fast analytical models with detailed computational simulations, we achieve the accuracy of high-fidelity analysis at a fraction of the computational cost.

Core Components

  • Multi-Fidelity Simulation Framework: Base classes supporting low, medium, and high fidelity models with adaptive switching logic
  • Optimization Algorithms: Genetic Algorithm (GA), Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), and Bayesian Optimization implementations
  • Uncertainty Quantification: Monte Carlo sampling, sensitivity analysis, and robust optimization capabilities
  • Aerospace Models: Detailed aircraft aerodynamics and spacecraft orbital mechanics models
  • Professional Visualization: Publication-ready graphs, interactive dashboards, and comprehensive reporting
  • Data Management: Complete results storage, export capabilities, and performance analysis tools

Applications

The system is designed for aerospace engineers, researchers, and organizations working on:

  • Aircraft wing design optimization for commercial, regional, and business aviation
  • Spacecraft configuration optimization for Earth observation, communication, and deep space missions
  • Multi-objective design studies balancing performance, cost, and reliability
  • Robust design under manufacturing and operational uncertainties
  • Comparative analysis of different optimization strategies and fidelity management approaches
